text: Tom Holland's time working on Avengers : Infinity War seems to have been exciting and terrifying and glorious and nerve - wracking all at the same time. Which is exactly how Spider - Man would feel. The young actor joins more than two - dozen other Marvel heroes in the third Avengers movie, which brings the entire Marvel Cinematic Universe together to battle the otherworldly warlord Thanos ( Josh Brolin ).
